column4:
Allows to change appearance. When a sorceress, allows to customize spells as well.
Do not equip, just press "Consume".
Not allowed to equip items in slot:
Welcome to <font color="#00c785">Custom Player Characters</font> (CPC) Mod!

ALPHA v9 version, NOT FOR PUBLISHING!
Special Chameleon potion was added to your inventory. Use it and exit inventory to launch player setup scene.

Important note: until you decide to use potion, the mod has zero impact on your gameplay.

Good luck on the Path!
You have reached <font color="#66ff99">new magic level</font>!
You have learned <font color="#66ccff">new magic skill</font>!

You have basic magic skills:
- {2115940118} ({2115940122}, {2115940140}: {2115940141}/{2115940142}, {2115940168})
{1077642}/{1084067}/{1076397}/{1084082}: Press "Fast attack" button (the same as for sword) to perform.

- {2115940151}
Press "Parry" button (the same as for sword) to perform.

- {2115940589}
{1077642}: Press movement buttons (to control direction, optional) + "Roll" (far distance) / "Dodge" (close distance) button to perform.
{1084067}: Press movement buttons (to control direction, optional) + "Consumables Slot 4" button to perform.

- {2115940158}
{2115940165}: Select Quen (default, can be changed in player setup scene) and hold "Cast sign" button to perform. Hold this button again to dispell.

The more you use the skill, the more powerful it becomes and more skill abilities are unlocked.
Follow the quest to find a teacher and learn new spells!

You are ready to learn new magic skills:
- {2115940146} ({2115940150}, {2115940149}, {2115940160})
- {2115940145}

You must visit Master Ainyerahn to learn them.

- {2115940146} ({2115940148}, {2115940149}, {2115940160})
Press "Heavy attack" button or "Light attack + heavy attack modifier" (the same as for sword) to perform.
{2115940148} and {2115940149} take turns in a ratio of 2:1 (default, can be changed in player setup scene).
{2115940160} will be performed with 25% chance if victim has less than 25% of health. These values improves with upper magic levels.
NOTE: You can't use {2115940160} on bosses.

- {2115940145}
Open world map and click on anypost icon to perform.

- {2115940156}
Select Quen (default, can be changed in player setup scene) and press "Cast sign" button to perform.

You are ready to learn new magic skills:
- {2115940152} ({2115940153}, {2115940154}, {2115940156})

You must visit Master Ainyerahn to learn them.

- {2115940153}
Select Aard (default, can be changed in player setup scene) and press "Cast sign" button to perform.

WARNING: This spell always have a small chance to backfire you after expiration. You will feel (a label will appear) when this happens.
Practise (cast many times) a spell to reduce this chance.

- {2115940154}
Select Axii (default, can be changed in player setup scene), select target enemy and press "Cast sign" button to perform.

WARNING: This spell always have a small chance to backfire you after expiration. You will feel (a label will appear) when this happens.
Practise (cast many times) a spell to reduce this chance.

You are ready to learn new magic skills:
- {2115940152} ({2115940155}, {2115940157})
- {2115940158} ({2115940162}, {2115940163})

You must visit Master Ainyerahn to learn them.

- {2115940155}
Select Igni (default, can be changed in player setup scene) and press "Cast sign" button to perform.

WARNING: This spell always have a small chance to backfire you after casting. You will feel (a label will appear) when this happens.
Practise (cast many times) a spell to reduce this chance.

- {2115940157}
Select Yrden (default, can be changed in player setup scene) and press "Cast sign" button to perform.

WARNING: This spell always have a small chance to backfire you after expiration. You will feel (a label will appear) when this happens.
Practise (cast many times) a spell to reduce this chance.

- {2115940162}
Select Aard (default, can be changed in player setup scene) and hold "Cast sign" button to perform.

WARNING: This spell always have a small chance to backfire you after casting. You will feel (a label will appear) when this happens.
Practise (cast many times) a spell to reduce this chance.

- {2115940163}
Select Axii (default, can be changed in player setup scene) and hold "Cast sign" button to perform.

WARNING: This spell always have a small chance to backfire you after casting. You will feel (a label will appear) when this happens.
Practise (cast many times) a spell to reduce this chance.

You are ready to learn new magic skills:
- {2115940158} ({2115940164}, {2115940166})

You must visit Master Ainyerahn to learn them.

- {2115940164}
Select Igni (default, can be changed in player setup scene) and hold "Cast sign" button to perform.

WARNING: This spell always have a small chance to backfire you after casting. You will feel (a label will appear) when this happens.
Practise (cast many times) a spell to reduce this chance.

- {2115940166}
Select Yrden (default, can be changed in player setup scene) and hold "Cast sign" button to perform. Hold this button again to dispell.
NOTE: For more cat appearance variants please install Immersive Wildlife Project (Dhu Cats)
nexusmods.com/witcher3/mods/3527
Customization [allows you to change visual and other aspects, always unlocked at skill level 1]
Special abilities [additional bonuses for the spell, do not affect stamina cost]
Lightning rebound [additional lightning with 50% of damage strikes another opponent]
Full blast [spherical wave throws enemies from all sides]
Auto-Counter push [when teleporting to a new position, a counter push is performed with 40% chance, and +1% chance at each skill level]
Puppets upscaling [increases the target's level by 3 during control]
Max puppets [maximum of controlled entities in total, which can exist at the same time]
Max servants [maximum of summoned servants in total, which can exist at the same time]
Max tornados [maximum of created tornados in total, which can exist at the same time]
Servant types [which servants you can summon, unlocked types can be selected in player setup scene]
Target pursuit [pursues an original target during all the time]
Meteors count [number of meteors at one cast]
Damage control [the spell deals damage only to hostile entities, but the player still takes damage if the spell is BACKFIRING him]
Burning [sets enemies on fire for 5 seconds with a 20% chance, and +1% chance at each skill level]
Freezing [freezes enemies for 5 seconds with a 20% chance, and +1% chance at each skill level]
Lightnings/Meteors count [number of lightnings/meteors at one time interval]
Two servants [summons two servants, unlocked types can be assigned independently to 1st and 2nd servant in player setup scene]
Auto-shield [when you cast the spell, shield appears with some chance]
Auto-apply [when you enter combat, shield appears automatically, when you leave combat, it dissapears]

- {2115940551}: vanilla types (Geralt, Ciri) let you play as if mod is not installed.
ALL custom player types let you customize your appearance and display name. Your game progress and inventory is always the same between any player types. When playing as any custom type you can do everything what Geralt can (except swords usage as Sorceress).
Witcher allows you to play just like Geralt.
Witcheress allows you to play just like Geralt, with retargeted female animations and AI-processed female speech.
Sorceress allows you to play with retargeted female animations, AI-processed female speech and with new magic combat system. To gain full powers follow the quest after selecting Sorceress.
NOTE: do NOT uninstall the mod after you made a gamesave with it, because some mod-related data is stored inside. You can always use "Chameleon" and return to Geralt (vanilla) to make things as if mod is not installed.
WARNING: if you change to Ciri (vanilla) you won't be able to use "Chameleon" and return to this scene, as inventory will be locked. The only way to return will be to use console command "NR_ToGeralt", and then use "Chameleon" as usual.

- {2115940565}: your appearance sets (you can save current, load any previously saved)

- {2115940566}: predefined appearance sets from all NPCs, in all coloring variants.

- {2115940567}: predefined sets from all Geralt armor sets, in all coloring variants. Do not change player head and hair in most cases.
For female player types are used armor models adapted by valrhea, so make sure you have installed her mod: JoWitcheress Models (pre-installed for ALPHA).

- {2115940568}: change appearance slots manually, for advanced setup. One of the ways to use it: clear all slots, then choose head, hair, body/torso, arms, hands, legs, shoes, then choose extra items.

- Switch stacking templates as items: for advanced setup, if you want to apply 2 or more templates from the same slot (rarely required).

- Show preview bodypart names: for advanced setup, shows names of current preview templates.

NOTE: sometimes after applying new appearance items may be attached to the player improperly (e.g. earrings). Saving the game and reloading a save usually fixes this.

ALPHA v9 version, NOT FOR PUBLISHING!
Use U (Photomode button) => quick "BACK"
Use W,S/Arrow buttons/Mouse wheel => scrolling choice list

- {2115940552}: allows you to customize your appearance as you want.
Available only for custom player types.

- {2115940553}: changes the name used for cinematic subtitles and hit log messages.
You can choose only from original game names (~950).
Available only for custom player types.

- {2115940554}: allows you to customize your spells appearance (color, type) and some other params.
Available only for Sorceress.

- Use female speech: Auto (recommended) - AI-processed female speech, used when you play as Ciri/Witcheress/Sorceress. You can download and install another speech variant/language from the mod page.
Current speech: {2115940999}
